title: 5 Chest, SKT Zed or Bloodmoon Yasuo?
body:
Who should I get?
I really like zed and have all the skins for him except skt. I also have arcade miss fortune and I wanna perm skin it, i'm a decent yasuo player and wanna buy that skin. What do you guys reckon?

replies.body: I'd reccomend bloodmoon yasuo, SKT zed is rare although it will come back every year and doesnt have any new particle effects. Arcade mf is a skin that you would use rarely and you wouldnt get your monies worth and blood moon yas has all particle changes and yasuo is always decent in the meta.
SKT Zed feels so clunky, it just looks like every skill isn't the same compared to PROJECT or Shockblade.
